article_title: Top insurance brokers: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co.
article_text:
Even for a brokerage known for its strategy of growth by acquisition, 2014 was a banner year for Arthur J. Gallagher & Co.

Before the year was halfway through, the Itasca, Illinois-based broker announced a series of international acquisitions that established it as a global player — Toronto-based Noraxis Capital Corp., Perth, Australia-based Wesfarmers Ltd. and London-based Oval
